1.content:
Unknown to most people, Fairies are real.

There are lots of different types of fairies, some nice, some not so much.

But today we're following the tale of someone touched by a very special kind of Fairy.

A Youth Fairy, who grant the gift of youth to those they're drawn to.

Who is visited by the Youth Fairy?
1.title: The Youth Fairy

11.content:
The Youth Fairy will be granting the gifts of youth to a boy who's already pretty Youthful.

But who?
11.title: A Young Boy (6-12)

choices: Mikey Is jealous of his younger Siblings.
Mikey's 13th birthday is coming up, and he's nervous about being a teenager
114.content:
Mikey is a 12 Year old Boy with Messy Brown Hair and Green Eyes.

He has 2 Siblings, a Sister named Natalie who's 4, and a Baby Brother Named Billy who's 1 1/2.

Why is the Youth Fairy Drawn to Mikey?
114.title: 12 Year Old Mikey

choices: He passes out and wakes up Younger.
1141.content:
Mikey is sitting alone in his room, playing a Video Game, Grumpy.

He has to do so many Chores! He has to go to School! It's all so much!

Meanwhile Nat has it easy in Preschool and Billy just Plays and Poops his pants all day.

He wishes he could be Happy and Carefree like the two of them again.

As he says this, a sparkle of light passes through his window, his TV going a little staticy.

He pauses the game and goes over to check the TV. He finds nothing wrong and turns around.

He Jumps Back a little as the Globules of light float in front of him before popping, causing him to jump back a little.

"I am Bellinda, Fairy of Youth, and I've come to grant your wish and bring the gift of Childhood back to you!" The small, winged figure says as she appears.

"What?" Replies a confused Mikey. But before he can say anything else, the Fairy has already begin sprinkling pixie dust on him.

How does the Regression go down?
1141.title: Mikey Is jealous of his younger Siblings.

11411.content:
As soon as the fairy dust hits him, Mikey suddenly gets really... Sleepy... And passes out.

So, how Young will Mikey be Getting?
11411.title: He passes out and wakes up Younger.

114111.content:
Mikey comes back to conciouusness.

He's a little groggy, but he shakes it off and picks himself off the floor.

Wait, the floor? What was he doing sleeping on the floor?

Mikey then remembers the weird... Fairy? Thing that said she was gonna... Make him younger or something?

He's so confused. As he gets off the floor he immediately notices something weird, everything seems... Bigger?

How old(or young) is Mikey now?
114111.title: Still the Big Brother(5+)

1141111.content:
Unknown to Mikey, the Fairy's Magic has Turned back the clock, restoring him to the Adorable Kindergartener he once was.

Mikey realizes something else is off, not just everything looking bigger.

What does he realize?
1141111.title: 5yo, Kindergarten

choices: Even Younger than Billy?(less than a Year?)
114113.title: More Ages

12.content:
The Youth Fairy will be granting the gifts of youth to a girl who's already quite youthful.

But who?
12.title: A Young Girl (6-12)

choices: Tara wants to get along better with her baby sister.
122.content: Why is Tara, a blonde girl at 8 visited by the fairey?
122.title: 8 Year Old Tara

choices: Clairs twin, less than a year old
1221.content:
Tara sighed as she watched her baby sister, bored. Little Clair wasn't even a year old yet, the little blond-haired baby giggled to herself as she smashed blocks together in her pink onesie.

Tara sighed again. The eight-year-old loved her sister and loved being a big sister, but something was missing. When she learned that Clair was going to be born Tara was excited forming all sorts of plans for playing with her sister. Then Clair was born and Tara realized how none of her plans of bike rides, swing sets, and park playdates wouldn't happen for several years! Turns out babies can't really do any of those things starting out.

Then there was the fact that her parents doted on Clair and not her anymore. Tara understood babies needed a lot of care, but there was still a part of her that was jealous. And now she was bored. There was only so many times she could play peek-a-boo before it got old.

The eight-year-old looked at her sister again and felt a longing well up in her. Tara wanted to play with her sister for real, like sisters, to understand her and be a good sister. But like it was now she just didn't understand babies. "I wish we got along better." She said out loud.

Suddenly a light filled the room. Clair stopped what she was doing to stare at the pretty lights while Tara gaped as a tiny figure appeared from the swirling lights.
The tiny woman smiled at Tara. "Hello dear! I'm Bellinda, the youth fairy and I've come to grant your wish."

"Wish?" Tara mutters. The fairy nods. "That's right dear. Your wish to get along with your sister better. Now hold still."

So saying Bellinda waved her wand and bright powder covered Tara, who stayed still in pure shock. Immediately the little girl could feel herself shrinking, growing younger. Using more magic, the fairy lifted Tara into the playpen. “Have fun dears!” She called before disappearing again.

Tara gasped as everything got bigger and her clothing changed as she continued to regress and soon she found herself regressing into
1221.title: Tara wants to get along better with her baby si...

choices: She finds she can talk to Clair(Rugrats-Style)
12211.content:
When Tara stops Shrinking she finds herself not that much bigger than Clair.

She doesn't know how old she is now(2 Years) but that isn't a question for her right now.

She looks over her body, her hands and arms are pudgy with baby fat, and she can feel something between her legs.

She looks down, seeing the Dress(White with Pink Ribbons) she was wearing looks pretty much the same, just smaller.

The moment of truth, she pulls up her dress and looks down, and confirms that she's wearing a Diaper, Babyish Designs and All.

She lets her dress down and heads over toward her sister, unsure of what to think of being 2 again.

What Happens Next?
12211.title: a 2 year old

122112.content: She asks her what first?
122112.title: She finds she can talk to Clair(Rugrats-Style)

choices: Mommy comes in to check on them
The two of them start playing together
1221122.content:
Tara walks toward her Baby Sister(well, maybe just Little Sister now that Tara's kinda a baby herself).

Clair notices and looks up at her and says "Sissy? You gets Smawwer?" Which Shocks Tara.

Tara wonders what's going on when she suddenly remembers that old cartoon Rugrats, and realizes that now that she's younger she can understand Clair!

Tara says "Da Fawy made me widdle so I can pway wif you betta!". She happily replies.

Tara waddles over to Clair and gives her a hug. What Happens next?
1221122.title: Clair is is the one who talks first.

12211222.content: Both of them play with some of Clair's blocks?
12211222.title: The two of them start playing together

choices: Mommy comes to check on them
122112221.content:
Tara and Clair start playing with the blocks, building little towers, knocking them down, etc.

Tara finds the activity suprisingly fun, which she guesses is part of being little again.

After playing with the blocks for a while:
122112221.title: Yeah

choices: She has suprisingly good control for her age
A Little Bit of Control, she knows when she has to go
She doesn't even feel the urge
1221122211.content:
While Playing, Tara needs to use the potty.

She's 2 now, so how much control does she have?
1221122211.title: Tara has to potty

12211222112.content:
Tara has a bit of control, she could maybe hold it a little. She does know when she has to go at least, unlike Clair

So Tara feels the need to go, but what does she have to do?
12211222112.title: A Little Bit of Control, she knows when she has...

122112221121.content: How long does she Manage to Hold it?
122112221121.title: Pee-Pee

choices: Tara and her Sister start feeling sleepy, Naptime?
Daddy come to check on them.
1221122211213.content:
Tara feels the need to pee, but doesn't even try and hold it. She's a Baby now, and Babies use their Diapers.

She uses her limited control to kickstart her wetting.

A tiny push is all it takes, and soon her Luvs is being filled with warm, wet pee-pee, before quickly getting wicked up by the padding.

Tara giggles at the feeling. She lifts her dress and pokes at the now squishy diaper.

Now that that's taken care of, what happens next?
1221122211213.title: She doesn't

choices: Nope, everyone else thinks Tara's always been 2.
Mommy is confused by the sight of another Baby.
12211222112131.content:
After relieving herself, Tara realizes she feels a little tired. She looks and sees Clair is too.

At the same time, Their Mommy(Polly) walks in, Tara looks at the clock(she can still read it) and realizes this is around when Clair has her Naptime.

Now about their Mommy, we know Clair still remembered Tara being Bigger, but does anyone else?
12211222112131.title: Tara and her Sister start feeling sleepy, Naptime?

122112221121311.content:
Their Mommy comes in and says "Looks like my little girls are ready for Naptime"

She comes over and picks up Tara first, taking her out of the Playpen, before picking up Clair.

She takes Tara's hand and leads them to Clair's room, which has now become Clair AND Tara's Nursery.

She puts Clair on the changing table, and unbuttons her Onesie. She untapes her daughter's diaper and finds someone's made a stinky.

She expertly changes her youngest's diaper and buttons her back up before placing her in her Crib.

She then moves on to Tara. Tara's too big for the changing table, so she rolls out a changing mat.

She pulls Tara's Dress off and has her lie down. She start ti change her eldest's Diaper, unknown to her to be the first one in years.

The wipes cause Tara to shiver a little, but soon she's powdered and taped into a fresh diaper.

Her Mommy blows on her tummy, causing her to giggle. Her Mommy goes to a dresser and pulls out another Onesie, but Tara-Sized.

Tara is soon dressed and ready for Naptime. Her Mommy lifts her up and Takes her to her:
122112221121311.title: Everyone else thinks Tara's always been 2

1221122211213111.content: Tara was soon tucked into another crib, sleeping for about...
1221122211213111.title: Crib

12211222112131113.content:
Tara is tucked in snug by her Mommy. Mommy then goes and grabs something and brings it over to her.

It's her Stuffed Kitty Bubble!!

Mommy gives Tara her plush friend and Tara hugs her tight.

Tara's Mommy kisses on the head and turns off the light, and soon after Tara finds herself off to dreamland.

Tara Sleeps like, well, a baby. She manages to sleep clean through the Hour and a Half of Naptime.

Tara begins to wakes up, still cuddling Bubble. The room's still dark, but Mommy will be there soon enough(not that she knows that)

What Happens Next?
12211222112131113.title: An Hour and a Half

choices: She tries holding it (as well a 2yo can)
122112221121311132.content:
Tara sits herself up and uses the rail of the crib to stand.

As she stands up the motions causes something to become very apparent.

She has to Poop.

What does she do about it?
122112221121311132.title: Tara has to poop!

1221122211213111321.content:
Tara thinks about what to do. She's nervous about messing herself, but it's not like there's an alternative.

Tara bites the bullet and starts pushing, her body instinctively moving into a squatting position.

Soon the pressure in her tummy is released as her diapie begins to fill with poo-poo, and little bit of pee as well.

Tara breathes a sigh of relief as she finishes pooping her pants for the first time in years.

Tara finds that goin poopy is nothing to worry about, in fact she actually kinda enjoyed it, in a weird, babyish way.

What Happens Next?
1221122211213111321.title: She starts Pooping.

12211222112131113211.content:
Soon after Tara finishes her Business, Clair wakes up from her nap.

The 10 Month Old manages to use the side of her Crib to help her into a Standing Position.

"Hi Sissy!" She says. "Hi Cwair!" Tara happily Replies

Just then, their Mommy comes in and Turns on the light.

Tara goes "Mommy!" And Clair goes "Mama!"

"Oh, It looks like the two of you are up already" their Mom then Sniffs the air: "And by that smell I have some Stinky Diapers to Change"

She Goes over and Deals with Clair First, then moves on to Tara.

After the Sisters are in clean diapers she goes to the closet and pulls out some clothes.

She dresses the girls in a pair of adorable Sundresses, Pink for Clair and Yellow for Tara.

What happens next?
12211222112131113211.title: Clair wakes up

1221122212.content: Their mommy, Polly, came to see them, but, was she alone?
1221122212.title: Mommy comes to check on them

choices: She was a 10 month old mentally as well?
She could understand Clair, and the speech sounded normal to her.
12212.content: She was now her sister's twin, about 10 months, physically at least. She found that...
12212.title: Clair's twin, less than a year old

choices: Someone comes to check on them.
122122.content:
Tara blinked in a daze looking herself over as she stops shrinking. Immediately she notices how big everything is, and how small she is. She looks at herself, her body now soft and pudgy with baby fat, covered in a pink and blue princess onesie with a diaper obviously taped on her under it.

Tara gaped toothlessly and looked at her baby sister, or rather just sister now that both of them were babies. The fairy had really done it. She was a baby now, just like Clair! She could be her twin.

Clair for her part was just looking at her once older sister with her head tilted to her side, confused. After a moment Clair crawled over and sat down in front of her still obviously confused.

"Sissy, why tu wittle?" Clair then asked. Tara gaped again shocked that Clair was speaking, and more than that she could understand her! Clair was talking with a lisp but she was saying clear words. Tara briefly wondered if this was a result of the magic that regressed her, or if all babies could simply talk to one another naturally.

Either way after a moment Tara found herself responding. "Da Faiwy, she made me wittle ba-be wike tu." She also spoke with a lisp but she understood what she was saying, as did Clair as the little girl squealed happily and suddenly hugged her sister.

"Sissy! Sissy! Sissy!" Clair squealed happily obviously overjoyed to have her formally big sister now just her sister. Tara returned the hug feeling a faint warmth in her chest. She didn't imagine turning into a baby, but she was connecting to her sister on another level now, and that made a part of her happy.

"Sissy pway!" Clair said suddenly breaking Tara's train of though. Despite herself Tara found herself smiling. "Otay! We pway!" "Might as well enjoy this for now," the regressed girl thought as she crawled with her sister over to the pile of toys scattered around the playpen.
122122.title: She could understand Clair, and the speech soun...

1221222.content: Was it their mother that came to see them?
1221222.title: Someone comes to check on them.

12213.content: Tara stops shrinking at older than 2, she's:
12213.title: More Ages

choices: Her mother told her to go do her homework
Her mother offered her a snack along with her sister
123.content: Hannah stared out the window of her school bus on her way home, from her long day of 5th grade. She had a long week of tests, choirs, and homework. Not to mention her two little sisters Lana who's 5 and Kayla who's 2. Hannah got up when it was her stop and exited the bus and entered her house.
123.title: 10 Year Old Hannah

choices: Tea and a bowl of grapes.
1232.content: She accepted it. She could eat and drink something while working on her home work. She want with...
1232.title: Her mother offered her a snack along with her s...

choices: Be a Kindergartener like Lana, who has it easy.
Be a Toddler like Kayla, who doesn't have to go to school
12321.content:
Hannah takes the tea and grapes and heads to her room.

She sets the glass and bowl down on her desk and takes off her backpack.

She opens it up and Pulls out her Homework.

She decides to start with Math, her least Favorite Subject, just to get rid of it.

She works on the worksheet, occassionally taking a sip of tea or eating a grape or two.

Eventually she gets stuck and a little angry about it.

Why does she have to do Math, why does she have to do all this Homework.

She Wishes she could:
12321.title: Tea and a bowl of grapes.

123212.content: She wants to be Kayla's age for that reason alone?
123212.title: Be a Toddler like Kayla, who doesn't have t...

1232122.content: What other reason does she have to want to be Kayla's Age(2)?
1232122.title: Other reasons.

12321221.content:
Part of the reason she'd like to be Kayla's Age over Lana's is that she kinda wants to wear diapers again.

She was Potty Trained pretty early, already in pullups by her 3rd Birthday, and in panties not long afterward.

She got curious when Lana was born too(she was 5), despite already wearing goodnites for her bedwetting.

They were obviously too small at first, but she still tried a couple times.

But once Lana was wearing a big enough size that Hannah could fit in her diapers, she began sneaking them like mad.

She even wet them a few times, which she somehow managed to get away with sneaking into the Diaper Pail.

She even Managed to get away with going poopy once, but it was too much work to clean herself up, so she stuck with wetting.

Eventually though, Lana was potty trained and her supply dried up.

She Eventually grew out of Bedwetting shortly before her 8th birthday, and even though Lana turned out to also be(and still is) a Bedwetter, goodnites just aren't the same.

And to top it all off, even though there's a Fresh Supply of diapers around because of Kayla, Hannah's gotten too big to fit in them.

With Hannah's Secret Diaper Desire Explained:

What Happens Next?
12321221.title: She wants to wear Diapers

125.content: Other girls around these ages that will be visited by her include...
125.title: More Choices

13.content:
The Youth Fairy will be Visiting a Teenage Boy

But Who?
13.title: A Teenage Boy (13-18)

choices: His first time growing up wasn't very good
He secretly wishes he could be a Little Kid Again
133.content:
Kevin is almost done with Highschool at 17 years old, but little does he know that's about to change.

He'll soon be visted by the Youth Fairy!

Why is the Youth Fairy Attracted to Kevin?
133.title: 17 Year Old Kevin

14.content:
The Youth Fairy will be visiting a Teenage Girl

But Who?
14.title: A Teenage Girl (13-18)

choices: An overwhelmed Chloe wishes she could be a kid again.
142.content: Chloe, 15 years old, will be visited by this creature, but, why?
142.title: 15 Year Old Chloe

143.content:
Emma is 17 with red hair, green eyes, and is very popular. She close to her family, including her parents, and her blind 14 year old brother, Mike.
Emma is visited by the fairey because she wishes to be a kid again?
143.title: 17 Year Old Emma

choices: Susan wishes she could be a kid again
Susan wishes she didn't have to go to college.
144.content:
Susan is an 18 Year Old Highschool Student, about to start Applying to College.

Little does she know she'll soon be visited by the Youth Fairy.

Why does the Youth Fairy come to Susan?
144.title: 18 Year Old Susan

1441.content:
Susan is in her Senior Year of High School, about to start the search for College.

Susan has a High GPA, an accomplished member of the Gymnastics Team, and Pretty Popular Overall.

However Susan has a Secret wish, she wishes she could go back to the carefree days when she was a kid.

This desire Attracts the Youth Fairy to her one day.

Where does this Encounter Happen?
1441.title: Susan wishes she could be a kid again

14411.content:
On a Rainy Friday Evening, Susan is sitting in her room on her laptop, streaming cartoons from when she was a kid.

Susan sighs, thinking back on her halcyon days of childhood.

She had just turned 18 a month ago, and soon she'll be off to college.

Or so she thought.

A glimmer of light finds it's way into Susan's Room, and POOF, the Youth Fairy Appears, Startling Susan, who quickly shuts her laptop.

"I am Bellinda, a Fairy of Youth, and I have come to grant your wish."

Susan is understandably confused by everything "A Fairy? My Wish?" She questions.

"Why yes dear, your longing for your Youth is what drew me here, and as a Fairy of Youth it's my Job to grant it to you!"

Susan thinks she must have fallen asleep or maybe there's a Gas Leak or something, but before she can Inquire further

PUFF! Bellinda sprinkles magical fairy dust from her wand, causing Susan to Regress.

But how far?
14411.title: At Home

144111.content: The Regression will cause Susan(well, more like Suzy now) to end up how old?
144111.title: Toddler Time! (4 or Younger)

choices: Susan coughs, it'll take some time
1441111.content:
Suzy will end up 4 again, a little girl in Preschool.

Does the Regression happen fast or slow?
1441111.title: Prepped for Preschool (4 Years Old)

14411111.content:
Susan coughs a little at the dust, which soon takes effect, causing her to rapidly begin regressing!

Susan freaks out(as you do) and starts trying to wake herself up, thinking thus has to be a nightmare

Soon Susan has returned to being 4 Year Old Suzy.

Did her Clothes Change with her?
14411111.title: Suzy immediately begins Shrinking

choices: Panties Suitable for a Little Girl
144111113.content:
Suzy is left swimming in her old clothes.

Well, except for one article.

The Magic at least transformed her Panties.

But into what?
144111113.title: Just her Undies

1441111132.content:
Suzy hastily crawls out of her now huge clothes and over to the edge of her bed.

She looks at herself in the Full-Length Mirror on her wall and is shocked at the sight.

She's 4 again! That Fairy really made her a little kid again! She looks around and sees Bellinda has disappeared!

Suzy wonders where she went, before carefully climbing off her bed to get a better look at herself.

One of the first things she notices is her Underwear. Her Panties have been Replaced with a Pristine Pink Pullup, covered in Princess Designs.

Did she wear Pullups when she was 4 the first time?
1441111132.title: Princess Pullups

1441111133.content:
Suzy hastily crawls out of her now huge clothes and over to the edge of her bed.

She looks at herself in the Full-Length Mirror on her wall and is shocked at the sight.

She's 4 again! That Fairy really made her a little kid again! She looks around and sees Bellinda has disappeared!

Suzy wonders where she went, before carefully climbing off her bed to get a better look at herself.

One of the first things she notices is her Underwear. Her Panties have been Replaced with a Poofy White Diaper!

Now this may be an odd Question, but did Suzy wear Diapers the last time she was 4?
1441111133.title: A Diaper?

14411112.content:
Susan coughed as the dust settled around her. She felt a tingling sensation, but besides the coughing and a sudden urge to sneeze nothing happened.

"Wha, what was that?" Susan asked before sneezing, spreading the sparkling dust in all directions. Bellinda hummed thoughtfully and looked at her wand in confusion. "Huh, it was supposed to work instantly." So saying she hit it a few time causing sparks to jump from the tip. "Maybe I need a new wand? Well, sorry sweetie. Your wish will still be granted it will just take a little while longer. Enjoy!" The fairy said cheerfully before vanishing.

Susan coughed some more and sneezed one more time. She sat there for a minute blinking in confusion her brain trying to reboot. Eventually deciding that she must have imagined it Susan finished her nightly routine and went to bed the incident forgotten by the time her head hit the pillow.

Little did she know that the fairy's magic was working, just slowly like Belinda had said. Susan e up the next day and began to notice the effects
14411112.title: Susan coughs, it'll take some time

144111121.content:
By The Next Morning, the Magic has already taken effect.

Suzy wakes up to notice:
144111121.title: immedatly after waking

choices: She's got something between her legs
1441111211.content:
The next morning, as Suzy wakes up and rubs the crusties from her eyes, she groggily notices things look weird.

She sits herself up and looks around. She can tell it's still her room, but now it looks like someone Decorated it for a Toddler.

She takes a look at her bed, Princess Sheets and a Railing?

She crawls to the end of the bed to check her Mirror(which is still there at least), still not noticing her shrunken state.

As she reaches the end she sees her face and is shocked.

She's a Baby? Well, maybe not a Baby. She's definitely pretty small though.

She hops off the bed and inspects her reflection closer.

She's wearing Pink PJs(the One-Piece Footie Kind) with white Clouds.

As she goes over her body does she notice anything else?
1441111211.title: Her room looks different

14411112112.content:
As she inspects herself, Suzy keeps noticing an odd feeling between her legs.

She Unzips her PJs and finds that instead of Undies, she's wearing a:
14411112112.title: She's got something between her legs

choices: She was still in Diapers at 4
She only wore them to bed
144111121121.content:
Suzy sees a Diaper!

She's 4 now, making diapers maybe a bit odd, but she just woke up and might be a bedwetter.

Did she wear Diapers at all when she was 4?
144111121121.title: Diaper

1441111211213.content:
So Suzy wasn't in Diapers at any point when she was last a Preschooler.

So does she wear them regularly now, or is she now a bedwetter?
1441111211213.title: Nope, this is new

choices: 18 Years to 18 Months (1 and a Half Years Old)
1441113.content: She'll be Even Younger than 3? Okay then:
1441113.title: Younger

choices: The regression will take some time.
14411131.content:
Suzy regresses all the way into a 2 year old.

Does it happen fast or slow?
14411131.title: Terrible Twos (2 Years Old)

choices: No, she still kept her adult mind
Not yet, that would take a bit of time.
144111311.content: She was soon shrinking, until she was physically 2 years old. Her clothes had also c hanged, diaper included. Was she also 2 mentally?
144111311.title: The regression happens immedatly.

choices: She has a tantrum. She dosn't want to be a baby again.
1441113112.content:
Susan was in a daze at first looking around. Everything seemed a lot bigger and she was different.

Susan looked at her arms, now tiny and pudgy with baby fat and felt something bulky between her legs. A quick glanced showed that her mirror was still nearby so she toddled over. It was difficult, her legs felt weird and the bulk between them pushed them out making it hard to walk. Getting a good look at herself Susan started to freak out

She was a baby! (Well two years old but she didn't know that.) Her mop of blond hair was done up in curls with a single butterfly pin in it. She was wearing a light pink dress with white trim and ribbons and, dreading what she would see, when she lifted the hem she saw that she was wearing a diaper! Babyish designs on the front and everything.

It had really happened. The fairy had really turned her into a little girl, almost a baby! Susan looked around but couldn't find the fairy anywhere. Susan whimpered a bit. This isn't what she had in mind when she wished to be a kid again. At this point the regressed girl noticed that her room had changed as well, becoming something more age appropriate for her new age: piles of toys, stuffed animals, pacifiers, a crib and changing table included.

Susan gaped at everything for a moment, trying to process it all. She realized at this point that while she looked like a two year old physically she still had her mind and remembered everything she learned growing up. It was a bit hazy though, but it was there.

Susan looked around the room and herself one more time before
1441113112.title: No, she still kept her adult mind

14411131121.content: She began by playing with some of the dolls.
14411131121.title: She decides to start playing

144111311211.content:
Susan looked around her rom a bit more, still in shock. "This has got to be a dream." She thought giggling slightly. "Yeah that's it a dream. There is no way I'm actually a baby again."

Her mind made up Susan decide to make the most of it and decided to play. Her eyes immediately caught something and she toddled over giving a squal of delight when she spied a familiar stuffed rabbit. "Bun!" She cried happily picking up her old toy. "Wets pay!" She said ignoring the childish lisp. Gathering up more of her dolls Susan was soon surrounded and she started playing.

The regressed girl lost all track of time, and soon even forgot what she was playing. She just couldn't seem to focus and switched games seemingly at random, but she didn't care. She was having fun and she didn't care what she was doing as long as she was still having fun. Susan just felt so relaxed acting like a little girl.

She was so into her playtime that she didn't notice anything else until
144111311211.title: Yeah

choices: There is a baby potty for her to use
She just goes in the diaper
1441113112112.content:
As she's playing, she suddenly feels a sensation in her bladder: she has to pee, badly! She puts her hands over her crotch and starts doing the potty dance. Naturally, her first reaction is rushing to the bathroom. But when she gets there, she realizes that now being toddler sized she's too short to climb on the toilet seat to use it.

How is this situation solved?
1441113112112.title: She had to potty.

choices: She'd rather wet herself on purpose
She tries holding it, but can't
14411131121122.content:
Does she bite the bullet and start Wetting herself on purpose rather than have an accident?

OR

Does she try and hold it, but her 2yo Bladder isn't strong enough and she has an accident?
14411131121122.title: She just goes in the diaper

choices: She pokes at the squishy padding and giggles
She wants OUT of her wet diaper
144111311211221.content:
Looking around, Suzy can't see a training potty

(there's a Stool by the sink, but in her panicked potty-dance she doesn't think of using it)

Suzy realizes there's no way around it, she'll be using the diaper one way or another.

She decides that wetting herself on purpose would be better than having an accident.

She squats down to get comfortable, relaxes and begins trying to wet herself.

Being Two, it doesn't take much for her limited bladder control to give way, and soon urine begins to flow into the diaper.

As her padding grows warm and wet, the absorbent material quickly wicks up the moisture, becoming squishy gel.

A wave of relief washes over Suzy as she wets herself, the pressure on her tiny bladder fading as she finishes peeing.

What does Suzy do next?
144111311211221.title: She'd rather wet herself on purpose

choices: She's hungry, time to look for snacks
1441113112112211.content:
Oddly enough, Suzy finds that wetting herself wasn't nearly as bad as she thought it would be.

She lifts the hem of her dress, pokes at the squishy padding and giggles.

It turns out it's actually kinda nice, in a weird babyish way.

What does Suzy do now?
1441113112112211.title: She pokes at the squishy padding and giggles

14411131121122112.content:
Soon after peeing, Suzy feels her Tummy Growling.

She decides to head to the kitchen for some snacks.

She grabs Bun and opens the door, standing on her tiptoes to do so.

She waddles down the hall and into the Kitchen, where she finds her Mother Making Dinner(it is Friday Evening after all)

She goes over to her mother and says "Hi Mommy! I Hungwy!"

Her mother stops cooking to look down at her Daughter.

Did the magic change her Memories to think Suzy is supposed to be 2, or did it just change Suzy and her room?
14411131121122112.title: She's hungry, time to look for snacks

144111311211221121.content:
"Dinner'll be ready in a bit Pumpkin" Suzy's mother replies. "Go play in the Den okay"

Suzy nods her head and goes into the nearby Den, in clear view of her Mommy.

She finds some more toys and starts playing with them.

A few minutes pass and Eventually Dinner is ready. They're having Spaghetti!

Suzy's Mommy calls her Daddy to dinner before going over and picking Suzy up.

She carries Suzy over to the table, and places her:
144111311211221121.title: Suzy's Two

choices: She tries to do it herself.
She decides to ask for help.
1441113112112212.content:
Suzy soon finished and stood up, feeling the diaper sag between her legs. Feeling this the girl grimaced. Honestly actually using the diaper wasn't so bad, it was what 2 year old's did after all and she was "acting" like one. While Suzy decided that using her diaper might not be a big deal the aftermath was. She hated how her now used diaper felt and wanted it off. She wanted it off now!

She flushed in embarrassment when she realized that she was about to have a diaper change, the first one in almost two decades but she didn't have a choice. The only question was if she would try to change herself, or if she would ask someone to. Suzy turned a deeper shade of red at the thought of having someone else change her, but if she remembered right all the needed supplies were high up on the changing table out of reach.

She could probably make it, but could she with her new body? Realizing the absurdity of the situation Suzy stood there for a couple minutes trying to make a decision, bouncing from one leg to another to try and ignore the feeling of her soaked padding.
1441113112112212.title: She wants OUT of her wet diaper

choices: Ok. Using the diaper wasn't so bad.
Emberessed. She can't believe she had an accident.
144111311211222.content:
Suzy whines, desperately looking around. She's too small to use the toilet and she didn't see a toddlers potty anywhere. "I'm not wetting myself!" Susan thinks trying to come up with a solution. She wasn't going that far, she was still an adult right? However it was too late.

Suzy soon felt the pressure in her bladder build, and then release as her new tiny bladder gave out. The regressed girl sighed as the pressure faded, then realizing what that meant gasped in shock. "No, no, no!" She cried feeling her diaper expand as she tried, and failed, to stop the flow. Honestly it was a miracle that her new 2 year old body had lasted this long, but Suzy didn't care about that.

The little girl just stood there in shock as she had an accident for the first time in years. She could only tell she had stopped when she felt the diaper stop expanding. Suzy poked the squishy padding thinking on what happened. After a bit the regressed girl decided that she felt
144111311211222.title: She tries holding it, but can't

choices: Go look for Mommy or Daddy
1441113112112221.content:
Oddly enough, using the diaper wasn't that bad.

Well, Aside from the shock of wetting herself for the first time in years.

The Diaper's Padding eagerly soaked up her pee(as diapers do) and the lingering warmth is well, warm.

As she pokes the now squishy padding she starts giggling a bit at the squishyness.

Suzy pretty quickly gets over the shock from her first wet diaper of many to come and decides to:
1441113112112221.title: Ok. Using the diaper wasn't so bad.

choices: someone else wished for her to be younger
1443.content: what other reason does the youth fairy come to Susan?
1443.title: SE

14431.content: Did Susan's mother make the wish?
14431.title: someone else wished for her to be younger

14432.content: Does Susan wish she was treated like she was younger?
14432.title: something else

144321.content: Why does she wish for this to happen?
144321.title: Yep

145.content: More teen girls she can visit include...
145.title: More Choices

151.content: The young adult in question is...
151.title: A Young Adult (19-29)

choices: She Didn't have much of a Childhood
15111.content:
Lucia is a 28 year old woman with Auburn hair.

She has a well-paying job, but is fairly lonely, not having any friends, and definitely not a boyfriend.

She has a younger Sister, Sara, who's 23.

Their Mother married her Highschool Sweetheart, and she had Lucia at 19(Math: she's now 47)

Their Dad? That's up to you.

So what draws the Youth Fairy to Lucia?
15111.title: 28yo Lucia

choices: She's Regressed, and ends up in Sara's care
She and Sara get regressed, and their Mom gets to raise them again
151111.content:
The youth Fairy is drawn to Lucia because Lucia didn't have much of a childhood.

Something happened with her dad a couple months before Sara was born, and so she had to help raise her sister.

So what kind of scenario happens to Lucia?
151111.title: She Didn't have much of a Childhood

choices: She wishes she could have been closer to Lucia growing up
Sara and/or Lucia ask the fairy to regress her too
1511112.content:
So the Youth Fairy is Drawn to Lucia, who didn't have much of a childhood.

So why does Sara get regressed too?
1511112.title: She and Sara get regressed

choices: The two of them pass out and wake up younger
15111121.content:
It's a Rainy Saturday Afternoon. Lucia has the day off and is having her Sister Sara over to her Apartment for lunch.

Little do the 20-something Sisters know they're about to receive a second Childhood.

Sara and Lucia converse over some Sub Sandwiches from a Local Deli (If you couldn't tell, they're in the Big City)

The topic of their childhood comes up from Sara talking about her job.

You see, she works at a local Daycare, and is talking about how cute the kids are, and gossip.

She eventually starts telling a story about a pair of kids there, Siblings, and how close they were.

She off-handedly mentions how she's a little bit jealous, and wishes they were closer growing up.

Lucia responds by wishing she didn't have to grow up so fast to help Mom out after the stuff with Dad.

The two of them sigh, if only wishes like that could come true.

Suddenly, the rain outside the window seems to slow to a stop, the girls notice this and are confused.

Suddenly a bright blue light pops into existance, fading to reveal what some might describe as a Fairy.

"I am Josephine, a Fairy of Youth, I come to grant the wishes of you two, and to give you a second childhood, better than your first"

The two of them can't speak from shock, but soon Josephine begins her spell.

How does the Regression work?
15111121.title: She wishes she could have been closer to Lucia ...

151111212.content:
As Josephine begins reciting her spell, the Sisters immediately feel themselves getting smaller.

Do their Clothes Change with them?
151111212.title: They start shrinking immediately

1511112123.content:
The soon-to-be girls find their clothing beginning to grow bigger and bigger on them.

But their Panties at least seem to be staying on?

Anyways, do the girls keep the 5 year Age Gap between them?
1511112123.title: Just the Undies

15111121233.content:
The Regression will cause the two of them to become Twins!

How far back into Childhood will they go though?
15111121233.title: They become twins

151111212331.content:
The two of them will be headed back to the Earliest Stages of Childhood.

They'll be becoming Toddlers.

How Young do they get?
151111212331.title: The Very Beginning (3 or younger)

1511112123311.content:
The Sisters don't know what to do as they begin Shrinking out of their clothes rapidly

The two of them hop out of their chairs and head for the phone, leaving their pants behind.

By the time they get over to it they're too short to reach it.

Soon afterward the shrinking comes to an end. The two of them stare at eachother, their Shirts barely hanging on to their tiny bodies.

Lucy speaks first: "Sawa, you're so smawl!" Before gasping at her high-pitched voice and lisp.

Sara responds "Wewl you awen't much better!" Before gasping herself.

The two of them head off into Lucy's room, which luckily she left open, and look in the mirror.

They then both go "OH MY GOD!" at their regressed forms.

"We wook like, Thwee Years Old" Sara points out.

The two of them help eachother out of their giant shirts so they can get a better look at their tiny, pudgy new bodies.

When they look back, they see their Panties have been replaced by:

choices: They can't come up with any ideas
15111121233111.content:
The two of them are shocked to see themselves wearing Diapers.

BABY DIAPERS, cartoon characters, wetness indicator, tapes, everything.

Before they can talk more about that they hear the phone ring.

They head back and turn pale when the Caller ID tells them who it is. It's Mom.

Unable to reach it, it soon goes to the answering machine.

They hear the Message She leaves.

"Hi Lucy honey! I tried your Cell but you didn't answer! Anyways I'm in town and decided to drop in for a suprise visit, I'm about 10 minutes away" BEEP

The two of them Panic, They've been reduced to Toddlers and now Mommy... They mean Mom is coming over!

She has her own Key too, and likes stay in Lucy's apartment even if she isn't home.

They have 10 minutes.

The two of them don't know what to do. Eventually:
15111121233111.title: Baby Diapers

choices: She Gasps, she Recognizes her Little Girls
She's Confused, who are these Tots?
151111212331112.content:
10 minutes go by and the two of them have nothing.

They wonder how Mom will take all of this.

After another couple minutes their Mom knocks on the door: "Lucy? You home?"

They stay silent.

The door opens. Their Mother sees them.

What Happens?
151111212331112.title: They can't come up with any ideas

choices: 28(Lucia's Previous Age, also almost 20 Years Younger)
1511112123311121.content:
Before the two of them can even try and explain anything, their Mother hugs them.

What happened? I can't believe it, but Before me are my Baby Girls again!

She lets them go. Before they can try and explain, Josephine pops back up.

"I can explain Ma'am. Your Daughters Both Wished, for different reasons, that they could have had a different childhood experience. As a Fairy of youth, it Is my duty to grant wishes of that nature, so I have returned your Daughters to the Age of 3, allowing them a new childhood, and to let them be much closer growing up than before. As for you, I have a gift"

Josephine raises her Magic Wand, and soon magic flows over their Mother.

She gets younger, but nowhere near as young as her daughters, just a little to help take care of 2 tots.

How young is she now?
1511112123311121.title: She Gasps, she Recognizes her Little Girls

choices: To look for that "Gifts" Josephine Mentioned.
To try and snap the girls out of their Shock
15111121233111211.content:
The Years Melt away from Ada(Lucy and Sarah's mother).

As her youthening ends she's left at her Eldest's Former age of 28, and the Family Resemblance is pretty strong, save for Brown hair instead of Auburn.

Ada gasps at her youthened body, and doesn't even care about the whole Fairy Business.

She tearfully thanks Josephine for giving her a second chance to raise her daughters.

Josephine smiles and says "It is my duty, but you are welcome. Before I take my leave, I have left you some gifts to start off with"

As she finishes her sentence, she disappears from wence she came.

The Newly Youthened Ada picks up her now Twin Daughters who are still shocked by what happened.

Well girls, what do we do first with our new lives huh?

She decides:
15111121233111211.title: 28(Lucia's Previous Age)

choices: Lucy's Guest Room has become a Fully-Stocked Nursery
151111212331112112.content:
The first thing Ada decides to do is Snap her Daughters out of their shock at the whole Situation.

She brings them over to the couch and lays them on their backs.

She then does something she hasn't done in years.

Out comes the TICKLE MONSTER!

She starts furiously tickling her Daughters, who soon go from shock to laughter.

"I didn't realize how much I missed this!" Ada exclaims.

The two girls begin begging their Mommy to stop her assualt, but she refuses.

Eventually the two of them team up to push her off of them and begin tickling her back.

After a little bit things calm down. Lucy and Sara look ashamed at realizing they just started acting like real toddlers.

Their Mom sees their faces and tells them "What's wrong? You heard what the Fairy said, you two get to be kids again, so Enjoy it!"

The sisters blush at their Mom's insistance that they just give in to being kids again.

"Well now that the two of you are responsive, lets go look for that "Gift" huh?"

The two nod and begin Helping(as much as 2 3-year olds can do) her look around the Apartment.

Eventually they Find:
151111212331112112.title: To try and snap the girls out of their Shock

choices: The Girls didn't get to finish their Lunch, and are still Hungry
Mommy decides it's time to dress the girls
1511112123311121121.content:
They find the Gift.

What used to be the Guest Room in Lucia's 3-Bedroom 2½-Bath Apartment has been Transformed into a Nursery.

And a Fully Stocked one at that. Filled with Clothes, Diapers, Toys, and 2 Convertible Cribs currently in Toddler Bed Mode

It's Everything needed to take care of a pair of newly Toddlerified Sisters.

Lucy and Sara follow their Mom as she goes over every Inch of the room.

What happens Next?
1511112123311121121.title: Lucy's Guest Room has become a Fully-Stocke...

15111121233111211211.content:
Suddenly, the Girls Tummies begin to Rumble. They didn't get very far into their lunch before this happened.

Mom notices and tells them to stay there and play for a bit while she makes them something to eat.

She heads into the kitchen and begins fixing some food for her Girls.

What does she Fix?
15111121233111211211.title: The Girls didn't get to finish their Lunch,...

151111212331112112111.content:
Ada decides to make Lucy and Sara PB&Js.

She Manages to find some Bread and Peanut Butter in the Pantry, and a Couple types of Jelly and some Butter in the Fridge.

She gets a Knife and some Paper Plates and Begins Making the Sandwiches.

Sara's is Strawberry and Crustless, cut into 4 Triangles, while Lucy's is Grape with Crust and Cut into Rectangular halves.

After Putting things away and Rinsing off the Knife she Brings the Plates into the Nursery, where she Finds her daughters:
151111212331112112111.title: PB&J

15112.content: The fairy comes to Phoebe because she's having trouble bonding with her nieces?
15112.title: 24yo Phoebe

152.content: An adult woman or an adult man
152.title: An Adult (30-44)

154.content: The Youth Fairy Appears to a very Old Person, but who?
154.title: An Old Person (65+)

1541.content:
Henrietta is very old. At 88 she's lead a full life. She has a big family, with many Children, Grandchildren and even some Great-Grand Children.

Yet somehow she'll encounter the Youth Fairy, and become young once again.

How does it happen?
1541.title: 88 year old Henrietta

15411.content:
One day, Henrietta is sitting on the porch, watching her Great-Grandkids play about.

Her Granddaughter Sophia set up a family reunion, and it was amazing.

As she watches the kids play about, the oldest only about 12, the youngest about a year, she reminiseces of her childhood.

Soon time seems to stop, as a mysterious light swirls into a ball and pops before her.

From the swirling bubble of light appears what can only be described as a fairy.

"Hello Henrietta, I am Julianna, a Fairy of Youth, and I've come to give you a new Youth"

Henrietta is obviously shocked, a new youth? What does she mean? The fairy part not even registering to her.

Julianna waves her wand, and soon Henrietta finds herself falling into a deep Slumber.

What happens next?
15411.title: While watching her Great-Grandkids play

154111.content:
When Henrietta Wakes Up, she'll find herself as Harriet, her Own Great-Grandaughter Via Sophia(Who didn't exist before now)

Ignoring the Details of how that works, let's just say she's basically Been Reincarnated.

Anyways, she wakes up as Harriet, who's:
154111.title: She Becomes her own Great-Granddaughter?

choices: Two or more People at once?
155.title: Even More Choices

info.brief_description: A Magical Fairy comes to bring Regression and the Joys of Youth to someone.
info.description:
Rules:
Physical Regression only. Mental Regression is allowed as part of the Physical Regression.
No Death, Abuse, Sex, "Fluids" Creepy Stuff Fetishes Etc.
Avoid Short/One Sentence Chapters unless it's a Choice etc.
Have Fun.
